descriptionHtml:
Only craftable at the LUNAR FORGE, these items are truly rare. Clear as moonbeams, their powers will help in your quests.


This mod changes the Lunar Forge and will conflict with any mod that also changes the Lunar Forge.
At this time the items can be crafted at any time, day or night. I am working on that problem. They will not show up at other forge lists, only Lunar Forge under misc. Please comment.



DONOT upload to other sites or use assets without permission, thanks BG
author: badgremlin
